author: The Hairy Bikers
method: In a pestle and mortar, pound the chillies, coriander, tomatoes, salt and onion to a fine paste.  Add a little water and lime juice to make a looser mixture. Mash in the avocados. Serve.
ingredients: 4 mild chillies, finely chopped,  bunch coriander, chopped,  2 tomatoes, finely chopped,  salt, to taste,  1 onion, finely chopped,  Â½ lime, juice only,  3 ripe avocados
